scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a deployed customer churn prediction model using a model inversion attack.  The attacker leverages carefully crafted input queries to infer details about individual customers, violating privacy regulations.
initial_goal: Assess the vulnerability of the customer churn prediction model to model inversion attacks.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking - Customer relationship management department using a machine learning model to predict customer churn probability based on sensitive demographic and financial data
